name: SonarQubePreBuild
description: Fetch the Quality Profile from SonarQube to configure the analysis
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: projectKey
inputs.label: Project Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SonarQube project unique key, i.e. sonar.projectKey

inputs.name: projectName
inputs.label: Project Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SonarQube project name, i.e. sonar.projectName

inputs.name: projectVersion
inputs.label: Project Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SonarQube project version, i.e. sonar.projectVersion

inputs.name: dbUrl
inputs.label: Db Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: SonarQube server 5.1 and lower only. The database connection setting, i.e. sonar.jdbc.url. For example jdbc:jtds:sqlserver://localhost/sonar;SelectMethod=Cursor

inputs.name: dbUsername
inputs.label: Db UserName
inputs.helpMarkDown: SonarQube server 5.1 and lower only The username for the database user, i.e. sonar.jdbc.username.

inputs.name: dbPassword
inputs.label: Db User Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: SonarQube server 5.1 and lower only. The password for the database user, i.e. sonar.jdbc.password

inputs.name: cmdLineArgs
inputs.label: Additional Settings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Space separated settings using the format: /d:propertyName=propertyValue. Normal command line escaping rules apply. For more details on the settings please view the [SonarQube docs](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=624390).

inputs.name: configFile
inputs.label: Settings File
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can also specify settings via a configuration file. A template is available [here](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=620062)

inputs.name: includeFullReport
inputs.label: Include full analysis report in the build summary (SQ 5.3+)
inputs.helpMarkDown: This option will delay the build until the SonarQube analysis is completed.

inputs.name: breakBuild
inputs.label: Fail the build on quality gate failure (SQ 5.3+)
inputs.helpMarkDown: This option is only available when using a SonarQube server 5.3 or above. It will introduce delays as the build must wait for SonarQube to complete the analysis. [More information](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=722407)

instanceNameFormat: Fetch the Quality Profile from SonarQube
